summary: The New York Jets are a professional football team based near New York City. They play in the NFL's AFC East division and are one of two teams to win their only Super Bowl appearance (Super Bowl III). The Jets were founded in 1959 as the Titans of New York and joined the NFL in 1970. They've had limited success since, winning their division only twice and facing a long championship drought, currently the longest in the NFL and among New York's major sports teams.
title: New York Jets
